notes: GOAL: Identify sacred components (preserved via import)
MISSION: Identify and document components that must be preserved via import mechanism

CONTEXT: Sacred components are critical UI elements that must be preserved during migration. These are preserved via import mechanism rather than z-index contracts. Examples include BottomNav, OnboardingModal, and Authentication flows.
SAFETY ENFORCEMENT: Complete sacred component list, verify import protection plan, test import validation
STABLE STATE CHECK: Confirm sacred component list complete, import protection plan documented, import validation working

executionSteps: Identify sacred components (BottomNav, OnboardingModal, Authentication flows)
validation: Complete sacred component list and import protection plan
